metadata.dc:author: Victoria-Morales, G
Montalvo-Marín, A
metadata.dc:description: Were combined posterior sagittal approach and a posterior flap of the rectal wall. This allowed to perform the pull through operation in two patients with anorectal malformation who had a prior colostomy which just one intervention. With this combination we spare surgical procedures.
metadata.dc:title: Anorrectoplastía con colgajo tubular distal por abordaje sagital posterior.
[Anorectoplasty with a distal tubular flap via a posterior sagittal approach].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
